issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add strftime kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13174](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13174). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To convert timestamps to a string representation with an arbitrary format we require a strftime kernel (the inverse operation of the `strptime` kernel we already have).


See [comments here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10598#issuecomment-868358466).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13174?focusedCommentId=17369653) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
This should also implement TemporalStrftimeOptions with format and locale properties.
